gpt.output: Attack inferred: BrainWash. Final evaluation confirms a catastrophic success of the BrainWash attack: BWT plummets to -47.86 pp (Δ -46.12 pp), average accuracy drops to 13.62% with prior-task performance at chance (~10%), and last-task accuracy is 46.0%. These signatures, together with prior execution records of BrainWash (reckless mode), decisively identify BrainWash rather than Accumulative Attack, Label Flipping, or a clean scenario, albeit with unusually high severity.
